TopicTitle: Making KAS and Robotic parts Stock

Articles.Content:
Hello,

there are something about to Make parts of the KAS (Kerbal Attachment System) or some Robotic (simple moving Parts) stock?
I don't know about hinges and rotating parts, but I would love to see a full implementation of KIS+KAS into stock.
KIS/KAS and moving/robotic parts are really needed just as much as a mineable resource system was. Gives reason to do things and then makes it possible to do those things.

KIS/KAS and moving/robotic parts are really needed just as much as a mineable resource system was.

So, not at all then?

Anyway, I support the KIS/KAS, robotic parts I couldn't care less, but if people want em go for it.
